title: file can't get edited directly after creating in webinterface
body:
### expected behaviour
edit files in webinterface by clicking on them (also directly after creating them)

### actual behaviour
the webinterface don't recognise it as txt file?

### steps to reproduce
1. create a textfile in the webinterface
2. click on the textfile
![2013-07-26 11_04_36-dateien _ owncloud enterprise edition davidak](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/91113/861491/7f8fc54c-f5d2-11e2-98d1-faecd34f1222.png)

3. it gets downloaded
4. reload page
5. click on the textfile
![2013-07-26 11_05_31-dateien _ owncloud enterprise edition davidak](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/91113/861502/cb337b06-f5d2-11e2-95f9-0830b851b08a.png)

6. the editor opens in the webinterface and you can edit it
![2013-07-26 11_07_48-test txt - owncloud](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/91113/861507/e1a153f4-f5d2-11e2-99f2-45ffd38c4fb9.png)

### server configuration
ubuntu 12.04.2 lts
apache 2.2.22 (ubuntu)
mysql ver 14.14 distrib 5.5.31
php 5.3.10-1ubuntu3.6
owncloud 5.0.9 (installed 5.0.5)

normal local storage used
ssl configured and working
cron every 5 min.
upload max 2 gb

### client configuration
browser: chrome 28

operating system: windows 7 pro

### logs
nothing related

#### browser log
nothing
